org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 BarrierBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.BarrierBuffer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointBarrierHandler

    @Internal
public class BarrierBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CheckpointBarrierHandler
    The barrier buffer is CheckpointBarrierHandler that blocks inputs with barriers until all inputs have received the barrier for a given checkpoint.

    To avoid back-pressuring the input streams (which may cause distributed deadlocks), the BarrierBuffer continues receiving buffers from the blocked channels and stores them internally until the blocks are released.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private boolean[] blockedChannels
      Flags that indicate whether a channel is currently blocked/buffered.
      private BufferSpiller bufferSpiller
      To utility to write blocked data to a file channel.
      private BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence currentBuffered
      The sequence of buffers/events that has been unblocked and must now be consumed before requesting further data from the input gate.
      private long currentCheckpointId
      The ID of the checkpoint for which we expect barriers.
      private boolean endOfStream
      Flag to indicate whether we have drawn all available input.
      private InputGate inputGate
      The gate that the buffer draws its input from.
      private long latestAlignmentDurationNanos
      The time (in nanoseconds) that the latest alignment took.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private long maxBufferedBytes
      The maximum number of bytes that may be buffered before an alignment is broken. -1 means unlimited.
      private int numBarriersReceived
      The number of received barriers (= number of blocked/buffered channels) IMPORTANT: A canceled checkpoint must always have 0 barriers.
      private int numClosedChannels
      The number of already closed channels.
      private long numQueuedBytes
      The number of bytes in the queued spilled sequences.
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence> queuedBuffered
      The pending blocked buffer/event sequences.
      private long startOfAlignmentTimestamp
      The timestamp as in System.nanoTime() at which the last alignment started.
      private StatefulTask toNotifyOnCheckpoint
      Handler that receives the checkpoint notifications.
      private int totalNumberOfInputChannels
      The total number of channels that this buffer handles data from.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BarrierBuffer

        public BarrierBuffer(InputGate inputGate,
                     IOManager ioManager)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new checkpoint stream aligner.

        There is no limit to how much data may be buffered during an alignment.

        参数:
        inputGate - The input gate to draw the buffers and events from.
        ioManager - The I/O manager that gives access to the temp directories.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when the spilling to temp files cannot be initialized.

      • BarrierBuffer

        public BarrierBuffer(InputGate inputGate,
                     IOManager ioManager,
                     long maxBufferedBytes)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new checkpoint stream aligner.

        The aligner will allow only alignments that buffer up to the given number of bytes. When that number is exceeded, it will stop the alignment and notify the task that the checkpoint has been cancelled.

        参数:
        inputGate - The input gate to draw the buffers and events from.
        ioManager - The I/O manager that gives access to the temp directories.
        maxBufferedBytes - The maximum bytes to be buffered before the checkpoint aborts.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when the spilling to temp files cannot be initialized.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNextNonBlocked

        public BufferOrEvent getNextNonBlocked()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Returns the next BufferOrEvent that the operator may consume. This call blocks until the next BufferOrEvent is available, or until the stream has been determined to be finished.
        指定者:
        getNextNonBlocked 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The next BufferOrEvent, or null, if the stream is finished.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the network or local disk I/O fails.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread is interrupted while blocking during waiting for the next BufferOrEvent to become available.
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown in case that a checkpoint fails that is started as the result of receiving the last checkpoint barrier

      • releaseBlocksAndResetBarriers

        private void releaseBlocksAndResetBarriers()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Releases the blocks on all channels and resets the barrier count. Makes sure the just written data is the next to be consumed.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getCurrentCheckpointId

        public long getCurrentCheckpointId()
        Gets the ID defining the current pending, or just completed, checkpoint.
        返回:

      • getAlignmentDurationNanos

        public long getAlignmentDurationNanos()
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Gets the time that the latest alignment took, in nanoseconds. If there is currently an alignment in progress, it will return the time spent in the current alignment so far.
        指定者:
        getAlignmentDurationNanos 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The duration in nanoseconds
